thread.title: Jet Edge adds new Falcon 2000s

author: Gulli Arnason
title: Jet Edge adds new Falcon 2000s
text:
Jet Edge adds new Falcon 2000s 
  14, 2015 
Jet Edge said it has taken delivery of three Wi-Fi equipped Falcon 2000 aircraft, adding to its large-cabin fleet of luxury charter jets. 
In addition, the company is launching immediate availability of a new custom charter pricing model called FlexBase. 
The Falcon 2000EX features a newly refurbished interior with pearl leather and forward and aft four-place club seating. The cabin configuration allows up to eight passengers to fly in ultimate comfort in one of the most spacious and quiet interiors in its class. 
The Falcon 2000LX welcomes up to eight passengers, configured with a forward four-place club seating arrangement and aft four-place conference table. 
The second Falcon 2000LX seats up to ten passengers with the addition of two seats opposite the four-place, berthing conference group. 
Jet Edge International, a Bard Capital company, is a leader in full-service global private aviation. As an integrated large-cabin management operator and maintenance provider, Jet Edge services aircraft owners with a world-class operational platform and extends individual clients and corporations 365-day-a-year access to one of the most diverse and luxurious aircraft fleets in the world.
